name: Cozy Masculinity
description:
Cozy Masculinity poses a short video game that negotiates the contrast of cozy game feminism to toxic masculinity which creates the foundation of video games as a whole. It is an exploration of what type of cultures these two ends of the spectrum cultivate in gaming and emphasizes the necessary growth cozy games bring to the video game industry.

CW: depictions of violence, gun violence, blood, death
PC BUILD RECOMMENDED
